page.title: 11Bank Holiday Monday.
page.content: On Bank Holiday Monday at 6 o'clock in the morning I had to get up and get ready for riding. I walked down to my friend and got my pony ready to go to Leicester. The people who were taking me came. I put Sox my pony in the horse box. It took us about 2 and a half hours to get to Leicester. Then we got the ponies out and met up with my team. There are 5 people in the team. Their names are Katie Needam, Joanna Haxby, Caroline Griffiths, Charlotte Cox and me. We had tack and turnout first and then the games began. We were in the lead and then we dropped down to second and then again to third, so we were pleased. By Emily-Jane Parker, aged 11.
